channel.title: Mysterious cape at varrock museum plz help :(
channel.description:
[b]first of all i got zenithscape source and client :p[/b]
hy guys, does anyone know how to add requirements to the object mysterious cape in the Varrock museum like real runescape
So if you click on the mysterious cape that the requirements in your chat bar gets and if you have done all these requirements, for example: all skills 99 and 120 dungeon ring All quest completed unlock all tracks msic ...
that you can get the completionist cape for 5m gp
and then if you completionist cape and if you then for the second time that you click the requireùents chalk for completionist cape (t)

item.title: Mysterious cape at varrock museum plz help :(
item.dc:creator: @chasemortier chasemortier
item.description:
@chasemortier wrote:

first of all i got zenithscape source and client

hy guys, does anyone know how to add requirements to the object mysterious cape in the Varrock museum like real runescape

So if you click on the mysterious cape that the requirements in your chat bar gets
and if you have done all these requirements, for example:
all skills 99 and 120 dungeon ring
All quest completed
unlock all tracks msic
…

that you can get the completionist cape for 5m gp

and then if you completionist cape and if you then for the second time that you click the requireùents chalk for completionist cape (t)
